CustomField.description: OID_ID field stores the 'C Number' from SAP for Contacts. This number is used by Java API to query Salesforce for customer hierarchy during LaunchPad's login process. The OID_ID value will be used by LaunchPad during their sign-on and step-up processes. As this field is used by Single Sign On for Consumer/Customer records, editing values is highly restricted.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field stores the 'C Number' from SAP for Contacts
CustomField.label: OID ID
